courses.title: AI Safety Fundamentals Course
research_projects: The Emerging Ethical Landscape: AI Proliferation and Readiness in Africa
Impacts on human agency from LLMs
AI Safety Cape Town: Fellowship Retrospective
Cross-Border AI Governance - A Focus on East, West, and South Africa
AI as a Transformative Tool in Promoting Access in Kenya's Criminal Justice System
Sustainable AI and Rethinking AI Ethics and Governance for a Global Context
Exploring AI Governance Education and Opportunities in the Global South
The Geopolitics of AI in Africa: AI Governance in Critical National Security Areas
State of AI Governance in Healthcare in Kenya
AI-Enhanced Food Loss Reduction and Circular Systems for Climate Action in Kenya
Advanced AI Regulation: A Dual Framework for Comprehensive Oversight
courses.feedback: This was a great initiative. Great job to everyone involved in organizing, tutoring, and monitoring this program. Your efforts are not unnoticed. - Lois Moses (Research Staff, Pan-African Centre for AI Ethics)

workshops.title: Deep Learning IndabaX (July 2024): AGI Horizons Panel
panelists: Professor Benjamin Rosman (Professor of AI at Wits)
Lydia De Lange (Executive Director of Deep Learning IndabaX South Africa)
Joshua Maumela (Senior ML Engineer at Vodacom)

feedback.notes: Overall, a very engaging event, but Vodacom guy had a bit of an odd perspective and the session overall could have used more structure

workshops.title: Deep Learning IndabaX (July 2024): AI Risk Workshop
components: Talks on AI development and risk landscape
Facilitated paper reading (Feature Visualization by Chris Olah)

feedback.notes: Great session overall, but the paper was a bit too technical for some

workshops.title: EA South Africa x AI Safety Cape Town Workshop (May 2024)
IndabaXS (March 2024): AI Safety Roundtable
workshops.quote: Thank you for hosting this event. It was incredible to be in a space that nurture conversions and knowledge sharing around AI Safety - Simone Renga (Data Scientist, Sand Technologies)

meetups.description: Casual meetups with meals and guided discussions

retreat.title: Condor Camp Retreat
retreat.participants: 24 top South African AI safety talent, ML professors, international AI Safety experts
retreat.outcome: Interest in forming AI Safety postdoc positions at UCT AI Institute and Wits MIND Institute
